website_summaries.verdict: The fourth edition of the New Balance Fresh Foam Vongo continues to be a favorite among stability shoe wearers. This shoe received positive comments about its comfort level, durability, and fantastic performance. On the other hand, a few buyers were not sold on the shoe’s weight and heel structure. Overall, the Fresh Foam Vongo v4 has proven itself to be a fantastic running companion as users find it recommendable and reliable.
pros: Many users say the New Balance Fresh Foam Vongo v4 is a comfortable shoe
The shoe proves to help relieve certain discomforts, such as bunions and back pains, as told by some wearers
Several buyers agree that the Fresh Foam Vongo v4 is sturdy and durable
A couple of runners have noted that the cushioning of the shoe is just right: not too stiff and not too soft
Transitions are fluid with the New Balance Fresh Foam Vongo v4, according to numerous runners
cons: A lot of reviewers wrote that the shoe feels more substantial compared to the previous version
Some users complain that the heel area of the New Balance Vongo v4 does not provide a secure fit and causes discomfort

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet and started to run again the new balance shoes made running easy again. No pain!!!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: 4th time buyer - and VERY satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I started using NB Vongo years back and this newest version (for me) is the best. The sock that surrounds the foot is really comfortable (although slightly harder to get the shoe on), and the fit is excellent. Compared to my older pair this one is very comfy and cushioning without slowing me down. I'll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Hans Peter Bagger

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes they are nice they fit well and I’m going to use them to walk. I was going to get super expensive sketchers but these ones are third of the price can’t beat that they really had my eye on the sketchers to you but they’re super expensive but these ones are super cool. But I had to make sure that I got the The black ones they are super cool.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Vongo v3 was a great shoe, Vongo v4 is not
customer_reviews.text: Vongo v4 is a complete redesign. The front of the shoe is now so narrow I get blisters running in these shoes. Around the ankle, they took away the comfortable foam, it's now a tight and uncomfortable mesh. I hope New Balance learns lessons here, and makes the v5 look and feel like the v3s.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Knoll

customer_reviews.title: Vongo doesn’t disappoint
customer_reviews.text: This is my 8th pair of New Balance Vongo. Owed 4 pairs of v1 and 3 pairs of v3. Great for long runs and half marathons. Always impressed even with the big changes into every version. NB is always my go to.
customer_reviews.author: justin whipkey

customer_reviews.title: Best New Balance Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have owned over a 100 pair of New Balance shoes over the past years in my opinion this is the most comfortable shoe they have ever made I have 2 pair I wish they came in more colors I will be purchasing more
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in V4  after 3 previous pairs of prior versions.
customer_reviews.text: Considering I bought the 12 wide, I was surprised how snug it was. But it fits. My main issue is that the shoe seems less well made than previous versions. Padding around the opening is gone. The structure overall is more flimsy. The sole is basically the same as the previous versions. NB should have left well enough alone.
customer_reviews.author: Norm de Ploom

customer_reviews.title: Different than the 860 structured shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Actual fit was fine. I have worn NB 860 shoes for the structure and thought I’d try these for possibly something better. Compared to the 860 I felt like the balls of my feet were higher than my heal creating an unusual feeling of pushing me backwards. I tried a light jog in them and it just wasn’t for me. Definitely lots of cushion but too soft. If I could have tried them on in a store I wouldn’t have bought them. Nothing actually wrong with the shoe, just not for me. I’ll stick with the 860. It wasn’t broke so I didn’t need to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: matthew perry

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've had at least 5 pairs in the Vongo series of shoes. This latest version is the best of them. This is a very comfortable shoe, with acceptable durability. It is often compared to the Hoka Arahi, which I have also had. The Hoka is slightly more comfortable, but it is much less durable. I wear a size 10.5 medium in most shoes, but I've worn an 11 medium in all of the Vongo's I"ve purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Binyamin

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: I used brooks pure cadence for several years until it was discontinued. Then I bought a pair of this and I like them a lot. This is my second pair and I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jose R. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: NB did an amazing job with Vongo V4
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the V3 for a while and I like it a lot, but V4 is more comfortable and fit my feet better. I have read that V4 is more narrow than V3 and it is true. So if you have slightly wide feet I would recommend to get the Wide one.
customer_reviews.author: ivan r gonzalo

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy but...
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I like version 3 better. The upper is now sock like which affects the stability. it is still very comfortable however and of course this shoe helps you with your pronation
customer_reviews.author: Rockstages

customer_reviews.title: Really good running shoes
customer_reviews.text: THese shoes were as expected. They are excellent shoes for heavier runners like me that need mild stability
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t even last 5 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this product. Ordered Sept 26th, only 5 weeks ago, and already falling apart. Should last much longer for a $140 shoe! Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. I have been wearing New Balance shoes for years now. Ever since my podiatrist reccomened them to ease my plantar factitious. I never bought them online before, I didnt want the hassel of returning them if they didnt' fit. I used some of the online guides to measuring my foot and double check my size. They fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable sneakers I've ever owned. Will be buying same ones next time.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt S.

customer_reviews.title: Try on at shoe store before you buy
customer_reviews.text: The back of the shoe feels like a sock. It's hard to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: MD golfer

customer_reviews.title: The cushioning is top of the line
customer_reviews.text: I've only took them out for one run so far, but so far so good. As an older runner (60+), I find I'm in need of more cushioning, but also stability. And that's why I bought this model. Still early but run #1 was gratifying.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Barbagallo

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes for my husband, they fit him perfectly. No period of breaking them in. Good quality and great style.
customer_reviews.author: cecter

customer_reviews.title: Not Squishy
customer_reviews.text: "Fresh Foam" is supposed to be the most squishy soles New Balance makes, right? Well, they're not very squishy, but seem fairly stable for my overpronation.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Great cushion, stability is good for my over-pronation, looks good.
customer_reviews.author: TVO

customer_reviews.title: Really good shoes a must buy
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet and these shoes are really supportive and comfortable . (With my old shoes I had so much pain after jogging now the foot pain is gone with these shoes.)
customer_reviews.author: Veer

customer_reviews.title: Snug at first
customer_reviews.text: The "bootie" design of these shoes was too tight at first, however I stretched out the sneakers a few days with shoe trees and now they fit perfectly. They also provide an excellent support and cushion for my feet when walking or running.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy and gives blisters due to lack of grip
customer_reviews.text: What a huge disappointment. This shoes feels so heavy when running. In addition, the lack of grip around the heel will easily give you blisters. I can’t believe how bad the new version is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Improved Vongo
customer_reviews.text: shoe sock is a nice change from last version. Lighweight, with lots of cushion. Good shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Todd P

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I use these shoes for running and I absolutely love them! Super confort and stability. Best look, best materials!! I would buy it again!! For sure
customer_reviews.author: Adonis Morejon

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe for a mid strikers. Had knee issues with Hokas. Tried NB 860s but had calf issues. Tried these shoes based on a friend’s recommendation and so far, so good. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph W Cole Jr

customer_reviews.title: The material is too thin.
customer_reviews.text: My son wore the shoes one day and the material is so thin his left shoe is already getting a hole. We are very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flat feet this is the best for you
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet The best and most comfortable I used
customer_reviews.author: Amer Z Alanezi

customer_reviews.title: Fresh foam shoes extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved the fit and feel of these shoes. He will never wear anything else but fresh foam shoes.
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Turning a great shoe into sheer garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Awful change from the V3, heel grip is especially annoying. Save you cash and hunt down the old model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I really like those. They are comfortable and support is good. They look great too
customer_reviews.author: seb

customer_reviews.title: Not the Stability I Need
customer_reviews.text: While these shoes (8.5 wide) didn’t work for me (they tended to throw my forefoot to the outside when I walked) they were comfortable to stand in. This shoe had been recommended by a runner friend when I went looking for a walking shoe because it offered stability to her. I wish it had been my solution, too!
customer_reviews.author: K. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Nice up grades
customer_reviews.text: New balance 1of the only companies that make wide shoes in small sizes have a winner! Having a sock style upper in a cushioned stability shoe?!! Love the changes!
customer_reviews.author: Dbo

customer_reviews.title: New Updates do not mean better
customer_reviews.text: Many issues with the new update on the Vongo. The ideas for new new updates are fine, but in reality they severely hurt the shoe. The new collar feels like you are wearing two pairs of socks on, the shoe is heavier, and the grip around the ankle area in the shoe causes really bad blisters. The old one was fantastic, I hope they go back to the old style ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Sevret

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and great stability
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Wider than average fit. Plenty of room in the toe box. Great overpronation control without being intrusive. About to buy a second pair!
customer_reviews.author: SHJordan

customer_reviews.title: New design causes blisters.
customer_reviews.text: Have run in NB for over 30 years. Agree with other runners about fit being compromised. Wore them a week and got large blisters on heels. Had to return them. Design has compromised wearable function. Need to return to version 3 ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: G. Richard Holt

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's Fresh Foam Vongo Running Shoes
feature_bullets: Smooth and Stable: For the runner who craves the smoothness of Fresh Foam but demands the support of a moderate stability shoe, the Fresh Foam Vongo v4 running shoe offers the best of both worlds
Built-In Off-Road Technology: Toe Protect technology helps protect feet from rocks, roots and debris, while AT Tread on the outsole provides versatile traction during both on- and off-road activities
Plush, Cushioned Running Shoes: These runners feature lightweight injection-molded EVA foam midsoles to provide lightweight cushioning and an NB Soft + Supportive Insert for memory comfort that lasts
Built to Last: With an all-over durable construction and an aggressive lugged outsole, these trail running shoes are designed to stand up to all of your outdoor activities
Athletic Aesthetic: With synthetic and mesh uppers that deliver breathability and a top-quality fit, these running shoes also boast a stylish look to fit in with your active lifestyle
